runes.name: Pure Power Lv.1
runes.description: Other allied Axie's Attacks gain +{attack_bonus_percent}% <Value>.

runes.name: Pure Skill Lv.1
runes.description: Other allied Axie's Heals & Shields gain +{heal_shield_bonus_percent}% <Value>.

runes.name: Philosopher’s Stone Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, this Axie's Cards gain +{base_stat_bonus_percent}% Stats, bonus +{burst_bonus_percent}% for each of your <Burst> levels.

runes.name: Pure Luck Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, if Hand and Draw Pile have > {cursed_threshold} Cursed Card, draw {draw_amount} Card; otherwise, allied Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value> until your turn ends.

runes.name: Energy Shard Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When the battle starts, gain {fragment_per_class} <Fragment> per unique Axie Class in your team. Creating a <Burst> heals allied Axies for {burst_heal_hp} HP.

runes.name: Last Wish Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Max HP +{max_hp_flat}. On death, Shield other allies and deal DMG to enemies for {death_damage_percent}% of Max HP.

runes.name: Pure Instinct Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Other allied Axie's Cards gain +{base_stat_bonus_percent}% Stat. +{per_class_bonus_percent}% more per unique Axie Class in your team. On death, Cards in your Deck lose {death_stat_loss_percent}% Stat.

runes.name: Shady Exchange Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Until <Round> {round_threshold}, when your turn ends, lose {fragment_loss} <Fragment>s. After that, when your turn starts, gain {fragment_gain} <Fragment>s. Whenever you gain a <Fragment>, heal allies for {heal_hp} HP and deal {damage_hp} DMG to all enemies.

runes.name: Vengeful Soul Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo} Max HP +{max_hp_percent}%. On death, gain {vengeance_percent}% of max HP as {Vengeance} and Cards in your Deck gain +{deck_stat_bonus_percent}% Stats.

runes.name: Way of Beast Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, +{rage_on_start} {Rage}. Attacks deal +{attack_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG.

runes.name: Dominant Predator Lv.1
runes.description: On targets with {Bleed}, Attacks deal +{bleed_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG then heal {bleed_heal_hp} HP. On targets without {Bleed}, Attacks apply {bleed_apply} {Bleed}, bonus {single_attack_bonus_bleed} {Bleed} on Single Attacks.

runes.name: Glorious Mane Lv.1
runes.description: Attacks cannot grant <Fragment>. Whenever this Axie attacks, its Attack Cards gain {atk_per_energy_percent}% Base ATK per Energy Spent (cap: {attack_cap} attacks).

runes.name: Reckless Hunter Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Attacks deal +{attack_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG. Per hit, attacks apply {target_bleed} {Bleed} to targets and {self_bleed} {Bleed} to self.

runes.name: Pangolin Scale Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Take -{unblocked_damage_reduction_percent}% unblocked DMG from Attacks.

runes.name: Inspirational Hero Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, on Even Rounds, apply {rage_on_even_round} {Rage} to allied Axies. This Axie gain +{card_stat_bonus_percent}% Card Stat when any allies gain {Fury}.

runes.name: Endless Anger Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{rage_on_turn_start} {Rage}. {Rage} on this Axie now grants +{rage_damage_per_stack} DMG per stack. Deal +{fury_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG in Fury Form.

runes.name: Brutal Claw Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. On targets with Bleed, Single and <AoE> Attacks create <Bloodstorm> then double the {Bleed} stacks on targets with < {bleed_stack_cap} {Bleed}.

runes.name: Counter Stance Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. <Counter Attack>. Deal +{atk_per_card_percent}% ATK per this Axie's Attack Card in your Deck (cap at {atk_bonus_cap_percent}%).

runes.name: Way of Bug Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, +{cocoon_on_start} {Cocoon}. Gain +{shield_bonus_percent}% Shield from all sources.

runes.name: Vault Builder Lv.1
runes.description: When your turn starts, gain {shield_per_draw_card} Shield per Card in Draw Pile. When your turn ends, gain {shield_per_discard_card} Shield per Card in Discard Pile.

runes.name: Blood Beetle Lv.1
runes.description: Once per turn, this Axie's first Attack deals <Pure DMG>.This Axie's Pure DMG Attacks deal +{pure_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG and on targets without {Alert}, <Steal> {steal_hp} HP, bonus {single_attack_bonus_steal} HP for single attack.

runes.name: Leech Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, <Steal> ({steal_min} to {steal_max}) HP from the closest enemy Axie and +{cocoon_on_steal} {Cocoon}. If you <Steal> ≥ {steal_threshold} HP, +{bonus_cocoon} {Cocoon} to other allies.

runes.name: Sturdy Fighter Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Single Attacks that cost energy consume {shield_consume_percent}% of current Shield and deal {damage_multiplier}x that amount as bonus DMG.

runes.name: Fate Maker Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. This Axie's first Attack in each turn discards {cards_per_energy} random Card per Energy Cost from Enemy Hand or Draw Pile, prioritize Enemy Hand. Enemy Cards discarded by allies deal ({base_damage}+{stat_damage_percent}% Base Stat) as DMG to the owner (Cap: {damage_cap} DMG)

runes.name: Collect & Protect Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, on Odd <Round>, +{odd_round_cocoon} {Cocoon} to all allies and draw {odd_round_draw} Card; on Even <Round>, gain {even_round_shield} Shield.

runes.name: Metamorphosis Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{cocoon_on_start} {Cocoon} and deal DMG equal to {damage_percent_per_cocoon}% of current Shield per {Cocoon} to enemy Axies. Receive +{shield_bonus_percent_per_cocoon}% Shield per {Cocoon}

runes.name: Greedy Leech Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Before attacking or stealing by this Rune's effect, this Axie removes {Alert} on the target. When allied Axies steal with a Card from targets without {Alert}, <Steal> ({steal_percent}% of the Card's Stat) as HP, bonus {self_bonus_percent}% for this Axie.

runes.name: Way of Bird Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, +{feather_on_start} {Feather} to allied Axies. Attacks deal +{attack_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG.

runes.name: Frail Egg Lv.1
runes.description:
When your turn starts, apply {weak_apply} {Weak} to an enemy Axie without {Weak}.
On {Weak}en Enemies, Attacks deal {pure_damage_per_card} <Pure DMG> per Attack Card of the target (cap: {pure_damage_cap} DMG), bonus {single_attack_bonus_damage} <Pure DMG> on Single Attacks (cap: {single_attack_cap} DMG).

runes.name: Gates of Unity Lv.1
runes.description: Attacks deal +{damage_per_summon} DMG per Summon. Bonus +{single_attack_bonus_damage} DMG on Single Attacks. This Axie's Summons gain +{summon_hp_bonus} HP.

runes.name: Energy Guru Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, gain {fragment_on_start} <Fragment>. Attacks deal {damage_per_energy} DMG per Energy Spent to enemy Axies.

runes.name: Raven's Tactic Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, on Odd Rounds, +{feather_on_odd} {Feather} to allied Axies. When gaining {Plume} from other effects, +{bonus_plume} {Plume}. Attacks deal +{attack_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG.

runes.name: Sacred Feather Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Once per battle, if this Axie would die, it survives with {survive_hp} HP, then Heals {heal_percent_per_feather}% of Max HP per {Feather}. Deal {death_damage} DMG to enemies.

runes.name: Feather Descend Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{feather_on_start} {Feather}. Once per turn, at {feather_threshold} stacks, consume {feather_consume} {Feather}, +{dagger_draw} [Feather Dagger] to Hand. [Feather Dagger]s deal +{dagger_damage} DMG.

runes.name: Sharp Talon Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, consume all {Feather} to heal allies for {heal_per_feather} HP per {Feather}. Deal +{base_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG. +{per_hit_bonus_percent}% DMG per hit this Axie deals until end of turn. (Cap: {hit_cap} hits)

runes.name: Flock Might Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, on Odd <Round>, randomly summon {robin_count} <Little Robin> ({robin_atk} ATK) or {mavis_count} <Mavis> ({mavis_atk} ATK). Summons deal +{damage_bonus_percent}% DMG per allied Summon and gain +{summon_hp_bonus} HP.

runes.name: Way of Plant Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, +{leaf_on_start} {Leaf}. Take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG from Attacks, bonus -{bonus_reduction_percent}% if this Axie has {Leaf}.

runes.name: Destiny Leaf Lv.1
runes.description: Max HP +{max_hp_percent}%. When this Axie's Summons die, deal ({damage_percent}% of this Axie's Current HP) as DMG to the closest enemy Axie.

runes.name: Forest Aroma Lv.1
runes.description: Until <Round> {round_limit}, once per turn, when this Axie is attacked, apply {sleep_apply} {Sleep} to the attacker. When each turn ends, {Sleep}ing Enemies lose {sleep_damage} HP.

runes.name: Rise & Ruin Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts on Odd Rounds, add {forest_breath} [Forest Breath] to your Hand. Once per turn, when an ally is <Cleanse>, add {forest_wrath} [Forest Wrath] to Hand.

runes.name: Leaf Cloak Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Whenever hit, if this Axie has {Leaf}, take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG, -{leaf_loss} {Leaf}, then +{ally_leaf_gain} {Leaf} to other allies; otherwise, +{self_leaf_gain} {Leaf}.

runes.name: Miracle Leaf Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{leaf_on_start} {Leaf}. Attacks deal +{flat_damage_per_leaf} DMG per {Leaf}. Attacks deal +{percent_damage_per_leaf}% DMG per {Leaf} (cap at {percent_damage_cap}%).

runes.name: Gaia's Embrace Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Allied Axies Max HP +{ally_max_hp_flat}. When your turn starts, +{leaf_on_start} {Leaf} to all allies and heal allied Axies for {heal_percent_of_max_hp}% of this Axie's Max HP.

runes.name: Healing Pulse Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. This Axie's Heals also Heal / <Reverse Heal> the target's other allies for {splash_heal_percent}% <Value>. Overheal from this Axie's Cards is granted as Shield to its target and dealt as DMG to the highest HP Enemy.

runes.name: Jungle Nightmare Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When attacked, take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG and (once per turn) apply {sleep_apply} {Sleep} to the attacker. On enemies with {Sleep}, Single Attacks and Reverse Heals consume all {Sleep} then <Steal> {steal_per_sleep} HP per {Sleep} consumed and apply {sleep_reapply} {Sleep}.

runes.name: Way of Aquatic Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, gain {bubble_on_start} {Bubble}. Attacks deal +{bubble_damage_bonus_percent}% bonus DMG from Bubble. Bonus +{multihit_bonus_percent}% on Multihit & AoE Attacks.

runes.name: Blunt Teeth Lv.1
runes.description: Attacks grant {fragment_percent_of_damage}% of Total DMG as <Fragment> (Cap: {fragment_cap} Fragments). If this Axie doesn't have {Weak}, apply {self_weak} {Weak} to self.

runes.name: Giant Bubble Lv.1
runes.description: Before the battle starts, add {giant_bubble_cards} [Giant Bubble] to your Deck

runes.name: Hearty Warrior Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{bubble_on_turn_start} {Bubble}. On targets with HP ≥ {high_hp_threshold}%, Attacks deal +{high_hp_damage_bonus}% DMG; otherwise deal +{low_hp_damage_bonus}% DMG.

runes.name: Calcium Armor Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Before the battle starts and when your turn starts from Round {round_start}, gain {shield_percent_of_max_hp}% of Max HP as Shield. When shield is broken, +{fragment_on_break} <Fragment>.

runes.name: Puffer’s Plight Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Whenever the Enemy draws a Cursed Card, they receive {bad_luck_on_draw} {Bad Luck}. When each turn ends, if your Enemy has {Bad Luck}, enemy Axies take {pure_damage_on_end} <Pure DMG>.

runes.name: Heart of Ocean Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{bubble_on_start} {Bubble}. This Axie's {Bubble Bomb} deal ({bubble_bomb_percent}% of the target's Max HP) as <Pure DMG>.

runes.name: Bloodlust Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Attacks deal +{damage_per_cunning_percent}% DMG per {Cunning} and <Steal> ({steal_percent_of_unblocked}% of unblocked DMG) as HP.

runes.name: Bombshell Maker Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, all allied Axies gain {bombshell_on_start} {Bombshell}. When any allied Axie dies, grant {transfer_percent}% of its {Bombshell} stacks to allied Axies.

runes.name: Way of Reptile Lv.1
runes.description: When the battle starts, +{spike_on_start} {Spike}. When your turn ends, heal {end_turn_heal_percent}% Max HP.

runes.name: Poison Touch Lv.1
runes.description: Whenever hit, apply {poison_on_hit} {Poison} to the attacker. Take -{damage_reduction_per_poison}% DMG per {Poison} on the attacker. (Cap: -{damage_reduction_cap}% DMG).

runes.name: Shellshock Lv.1
runes.description: When allied Secrets are triggered, deal {pure_damage_on_trigger} <Pure DMG> to enemy Axies then Heal {heal_on_trigger} HP.

runes.name: Venom Master Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Before the battle starts, add {venom_burst_cards} [Venom Burst] to your Deck. When your turn starts, apply {poison_per_tick} {Poison} to a random Enemy {repeat_times} times.

runes.name: Desert Protector Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When enemy turn starts, on Odd <Round>, gain {guard_on_odd} {Guard} and {shield_on_odd} Shield. When {Guard} triggers, deal {damage_per_shield} DMG to the closest Enemy Axie per {shield_unit} Shield lost.

runes.name: Prehistoric Armor Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{spike_on_start} {Spike}. {Spike} on this Axie grant +{bloodspike_min} to {bloodspike_max} {Bloodspike}. Whenever hit, heal {heal_on_hit} HP.

runes.name: Regenerator Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, heal {heal_percent_of_max_hp}% of Max HP and <Cleanse>: {cleanse_count}. Overheal on this Axie is converted to Shield for the lowest HP allied Axie.

runes.name: Paralyzing Glare Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Debuff Cards apply {doubt_apply} {Doubt} then deal <Pure DMG> equal to ({base_damage} + total number of debuffs on the target) to enemy Axies. (Cap: {damage_cap} DMG)

runes.name: Spike Spray Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, +{spike_on_start} {Spike}. Before hit, gain ({shield_per_stack} Shield per {Spike} and {Bloodspike}) up to {shield_cap} Shield then consume {bloodspike_consume_percent}% of {Bloodspike} to deal {damage_per_bloodspike} Pure DMG per {Bloodspike} consumed to all enemies.

runes.name: Trap Nullifier Lv.1
runes.description: Before the battle starts, +{scan_cards} [Scan] to your Deck. This Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value>.

runes.name: Steelskin Lv.1
runes.description: Take -{flat_damage_reduction} DMG from Attacks.

runes.name: Zap Armor Lv.1
runes.description: Reflect {reflect_percent}% DMG taken to Attackers. While Shielded, take -{shielded_damage_reduction_percent}% DMG from Attacks.

runes.name: Solid Bulwark Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Before the battle starts, +{bulwark_on_start} {Bulwark}. When your turn ends, {shield_convert_percent}% of DMG from this Axie's Attacks this turn is granted as Shield to self (Cap: {shield_cap} Shield).

runes.name: Adaptive Program Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Receive +{shield_bonus_percent}% Shield from Cards. For every {shield_threshold} Shield cumulatively received from Cards, gain {fragment_gain} <Fragment>.

runes.name: Lens of Truth Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Attacks remove up to {secret_remove} Secret from their targets. On targets without Secrets, deal +{damage_bonus_percent}% DMG.

runes.name: Shield Backup Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Gain {shield_gain_percent}% Shield from all sources. Take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG from Attacks, bonus -{shielded_bonus_reduction_percent}% while Shielded. Retain {shield_retain_percent}% of leftover Shield.

runes.name: Last Stand Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Once per battle, if this Axie would die, gain <Immortal> for {immortal_turns} turns, lose any {Taunt}, & +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value> while <Immortal>.

runes.name: Rocket Barrage Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Every {hits_per_rocket} hits from Allied Axies, fire a {Rocket} at the lowest HP Enemy Axie. Every {rockets_per_big} {Rocket}s fired, fire a {Big Rocket} at the enemy team.

runes.name: Divine Ring Lv.1
runes.description: Before the battle starts, +{prayer_cards} [Prayer] to your Deck. This Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value>.

runes.name: Arcane Protection Lv.1
runes.description: Take -{base_reduction_percent}% DMG from all sources. Bonus -{bonus_reduction_per_buff}% per Buff or Secret on this Axie. (Cap: bonus -{bonus_cap_percent}% DMG)

runes.name: Tiny Guardian Lv.1
runes.description: This Axie's Summons gain {summon_shield} Shield when summoned and {guard_next_turn} {Guard} next turn.

runes.name: Rejuvenate Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. This Axie's Heals and Shields gain +{stat_bonus_percent}% Stats and apply {cleanser_apply} {Cleanser}. Apply {single_target_bonus_cleanser} bonus {Cleanser} on Single Targets.

runes.name: Heaven's Echoes Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. After attacking, until your turn ends, other allied Axies' Attacks deal +{ally_damage_bonus_percent}% DMG. Once per turn, after playing a Skill or Secret, other allies gain {shield_on_skill} Shield.

runes.name: Healing Force Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Allied summons take -{summon_damage_reduction_percent}% DMG from all Sources. When your turn starts, for each living ally, heal allies for {heal_per_ally} HP and deal {damage_per_ally} DMG to enemies.

runes.name: Holy Prayer Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, <Purify>: {purify_count}. Allied Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value>; +{bonus_with_curse_percent}% more while there are Cursed Cards in your Deck.

runes.name: Celestial Might Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. This Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value> and +{fragment_per_energy} <Fragment> per Energy spent when played. They are <Banish>ed after being played {banish_after_plays} times.

runes.name: Guardian Angel Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Max HP +{max_hp_percent}%. Take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG from all sources. {redirect_percent}% of DMG taken by other allied Axies is taken by this Axie instead.

runes.name: Dark Flame Lv.1
runes.description: Before the battle starts, +{purge_cards} [Purge] to your Deck. This Axie's Cards gain +{value_bonus_percent}% <Value>.

runes.name: Cursed Ritual Lv.1
runes.description: When your turn ends, per Cursed Card in the Enemy Deck, heal {heal_per_curse} HP and the closest enemy Axie loses {damage_per_curse} HP. (Cap: {curse_cap} Curse Cards)

runes.name: Malediction Lv.1
runes.description: On targets with Debuffs, Attacks deal +{damage_bonus_percent}% DMG. From attackers with Debuffs, take -{damage_reduction_percent}% DMG.

runes.name: Wicked Ward Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Whenever an ally plays a Card that applies Curse, allied Axies gain {shield_on_curse} Shield.

runes.name: Plague Bearer Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn ends, gain {debuff_counts} counts of {random_debuff} random debuff. When attacked, take -{damage_reduction_per_debuff}% DMG per debuff counter on this Axie (Cap: -{damage_reduction_cap}% DMG) and create a <Plague Wave>.

runes.name: Moonlight Thief Lv.1
runes.description:
{Solo}. When your turn starts, if you have less <Fragment> or <Burst> Level than the Enemy, <Steal> {steal_fragments} Fragment.
When your turn ends, Heal ({base_heal} + {heal_per_fragment}x your <Fragment>s) as HP.

runes.name: Gloomy Dice Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. When your turn starts, on Odd <Round>, randomly apply {fear_min} to {fear_max} {Fear} to {target_count} random Enemy Axies. [Confused] deal {confused_min}x to {confused_max}x DMG to enemies.

runes.name: Soul Eater Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Whenever this Axie targets an enemy Axie with a card that costs >{energy_threshold}, <Dispel>: {dispel_on_target} then <Dispel>: {dispel_on_all} all enemy Axies and they lose ({hp_loss_percent}% of their Current HP).

runes.name: Fading Eclipse Lv.1
runes.description: {Solo}. Enemies deal -{base_damage_reduction_percent}% DMG. When each Round ends, until Round {round_limit}, this effect is reduced by {reduction_step_percent}%.
